pt.ua.concurrent

Class ExternalBarrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.concurrent.CObject
      • pt.ua.concurrent.Barrier
        • pt.ua.concurrent.ExternalBarrier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterruptibleAwaitingThreads, SyncCV
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TriggeredBarrier

    public abstract class ExternalBarrier
extends Barrier
    An externally triggered thread barrier abstract class.
    In this type of barrier, the barrier is released by an externally usable (public) method (release).

    This class follows DbC(tm) methodology (Wikipedia). Where possible, contracts are implement with native's Java assert.

    Version:
    0.5, December 2015
    Author:
    Miguel Oliveira e Silva (mos@ua.pt)

      abstract void release()

        public abstract void release()

        Postcondition:
